nodes.text: Rexler Brath was an Imperial TIE pilot who flew a TIE/IN interceptor and survived at least twenty combat missions, being selected to fly a TIE/D Defender as a reward. Shortly before 4 ABY's Battle of Endor, Brath was assigned to lead the Imperial Onyx Squadron, under the call sign Onyx Leader, and would lead the squadron during the subsequent battle.

Rexler Brath, a male Imperial TIE pilot, flew a TIE/IN interceptor during the Galactic Civil War fought between the Empire and the Alliance to Restore the Republic. At some point, he was one of multiple TIE interceptor pilots who had flown and survived at least twenty combat missions and were selected to fly TIE/D Defenders. Shortly before 4 ABY's Battle of Endor, Rexler Brath, while serving as a TIE/D Defender pilot, was assigned to lead Onyx Squadron, flying under the call sign Onyx Leader. At one point, Brath, firing his TIE/D Defender's laser cannons, flew in front of a starship.  Brath ultimately led Onyx Squadron during the Battle of Endor, which led to an Imperial defeat by the Alliance to Restore the Republic.

At some point while serving as Onyx Leader, Brath recounted the selection process for the TIE/D Defender pilots, and as part of that group, he individually considered all of them to either be the Imperial Navy's best or luckiest pilots after they each survived at least twenty combat missions.
Rexler Brath was created by 2003's The New Essential Guide to Vehicles and Vessels.
